Articles.Content:
There's an important thread about the future of CKAN in the "CKAN Continuation Discussion" thread.  

Authors: Please be sure to join the thread and lend your voice to this important discussion.

Users: Sadly, your opinion is not valued at this time. Or at least mine wasn't, maybe you'll have a better chance?
We really don't need anymore threads on this subject as the main thread has had no trouble being the top thread in add on discussions for quite some time now. Locking.
